input.sentences: she was wearing her mother 's wedding gown
the new family was ready to start their new life .
he felt like the luckiest man .
they make such a cute couple .
output.sentences: It is the day that she has been dreaming about, her wedding day.
All of the family has gathered to witness the wedding.
Their daughter was the cutest flower girl.  It was special for her to be in the wedding.
They were college sweethearts and everyone knew that they would stay together forever.
They couldn't wait to start the rest of their lives.
